Plot: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.
Title: Not Another Teen Movie
Writer: Mike Bender, Adam Jay Epstein, Andrew Jacobson, Phil Beauman, Buddy Johnson
Actors: Chyler Leigh, Chris Evans, Jaime Pressly, Eric Christian Olsen
tomatoConsensus: NATM has some funny moments, but the movie requires the audience to have familiarity with the movies being spoofed and a tolerance for toilet and sexual humor to be truly effective.
